testcase.name: DBA.FR37
testcase.description: DBA.FR37: arr:DescriptionOfQualificationsOfAssuranceEngagementPerformed must not contain the following text: 'har ikke givet anledning til forbehold' or 'has not given rise to reservations'.

variation.name: Invalid
variation.description: DescriptionOfQualificationsOfAssuranceEngagementPerformed contains 'has not given rise to reservations'
